title: Leadership Competency Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of pedagogy and at least 1 year of teaching experience
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning, centered on leadership case studies in language education settings

learning_goals: Achieve 80% or higher practical performance in decision-making and problem-solving competencies required in educational settings.
Apply collaborative leadership skills with peer teachers through team-based project execution.
Categorize and implement at least five context-specific communication strategies for learner motivation.
Systematically document leadership growth by writing self-reflection journals on LMS at least three times weekly.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
